comment.author: 14339140@N05
comment._content: The attempt to assassinate the King and Queen was carried out by a Spanish anarchist, Mateo Morral. The bomb allegedly killed 27 people. More info: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mateo_Morral Also, a video of the attack with the dead horse being removed: www.youtube.com/watch?v=RpwCMWrBnXM
